entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA The commissioner of the US Food and Drug Administration on Sunday declined to defend the President's unfounded claim that 99% of coronavirus cases are "totally harmless" and repeatedly refused to say whether Trump's remark is true or false. Yep your a YES man
